title: Dubai
content:
Activities: Explore the futuristic skyline with a guided city tour including the Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall, step back in time at the historic Al Fahidi district, ride an abra across Dubai Creek, shop in the bustling spice and gold souks, experience thrills on a desert safari with dune bashing and a barbecue dinner, relax at Jumeirah Beach, enjoy a day trip to the dazzling Sheikh Zayed Mosque in Abu Dhabi, and savor global cuisine at top restaurants or local markets.

Services: Stay at 3 star hotels with daily breakfast and select meals, all airport and city transfers, private vehicle for tours, experienced guides, and entrance fees to major attractions included.

Dubai blends tradition and innovation in the heart of the Middle East. Discover iconic skyscrapers, world-class shopping, and vibrant culture alongside ancient markets and serene desert landscapes. This cosmopolitan hub is perfect for travelers seeking adventure, luxury, and unforgettable memories, all while enjoying seamless comfort and hospitality.

title: Greece
content:
Services: 3 star hotels, daily breakfast and selected meals, airport and intercity transfers, private vehicle for sightseeing, guided city tours, and all entrance fees for major attractions.

Activities: Enjoy a guided tour of Athens including the Acropolis and museum, stroll through the vibrant Plaka and Monastiraki neighborhoods, take a scenic ferry to Mykonos or Santorini, experience island beach hopping, taste local Greek cuisine at authentic tavernas, enjoy a Santorini sunset cruise, and visit traditional villages and wineries.

Greece is a stunning Mediterranean destination known for ancient history, breathtaking islands, and delicious cuisine. Explore Athens' majestic Acropolis, wander through charming streets in Santorini or Mykonos, and unwind on sun-kissed beaches and crystal-clear waters. Your adventure features iconic landmarks, local tavernas, and unforgettable sunsets, with flexible itineraries for every traveler.

title: Thailand
content:
Activities: Discover Bangkok's bustling street markets and vibrant Chinatown, visit the Grand Palace and Wat Pho, enjoy a boat ride on the Chao Phraya River, explore Chiang Mai's ancient temples and night markets, participate in an ethical elephant sanctuary visit, relax on the beaches of Phuket or Krabi, and experience island hopping and snorkeling adventures.

Services: Cozy 3 star hotels, daily breakfast and select meals, airport and intercity transfers, private vehicle for tours, expert guides, and entrance fees included.

Thailand offers a vibrant cultural experience blended with serene natural beauty, lively markets, rich history, and pristine beaches, making it a perfect destination for both adventure and relaxation.

title: Vietnam
content:
Activities: Walk the atmospheric streets of Hanoi's Old Quarter, cruise the magical limestone islets of Halong Bay, discover the lantern-lit beauty of Hoi An, shop in bustling city markets, take a countryside bike tour, learn to cook authentic Vietnamese dishes, relax on the beaches of Nha Trang, and explore ancient temples and vibrant local history in Hue and Ho Chi Minh City.

Services: Comfortable 3 star hotels, included daily breakfast and meals, airport pick-up and drop-off, private transfers between cities, guided sightseeing excursions, and all main attraction entry tickets.

 Vietnam offers a captivating blend of ancient tradition, natural beauty, and dynamic cities. From peaceful rural landscapes to vibrant urban adventures and delicious street food, this package highlights the best Vietnam has to offer for travelers eager to immerse themselves in Southeast Asia's charm and warmth.
